title: Ceiling Fan, On-Site Maintenance, Playground
posting_body: Trinity Park Apartments, located in Irving, TX, is the perfect place for you to call home.

Close to the shopping and entertainment in Las Colinas, Grand Prairie Premium Outlets and minutes from DFW Airport, the 504 Dart bus line, President George Bush Tollway, highways 114 and 183; our location is everything you are looking for in your new home.
New to the neighborhood is the 2.4 mile Rock Island Road Bike and Pedestrian Trail located directly across the street!
Spacious 1 and 2 bedroom floorplans come with wood-style plank flooring*, black cabinets, black appliances*, and two-tone paint.
Full size washer/dryer hook-ups are in every home and the closet space is something dreams are made of.
A refreshing pool (open seasonally) and picnic areas are available for your enjoyment, and there is plenty of parking throughout the community.
Make your appointment today and come see your new home!
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183
